text: we have here the three most buzzed-about
smartphones on the market we're going to
talk about their three cameras what's
good about them what's bad about them
and which one I still think you should
buy one of the big things that you can
debate about these smart phones is which
has the best camera when Google released
the pixel one of the big claims made
about it was that it has the best
smartphone camera you can find but I was
also a little skeptical at this point
all the best smartphone cameras in the
world are pretty similar in terms of
their hardware so what really matters is
their automatic features how good the
exposure is which is basically how
bright or dark it is how good the white
balance which is basically a decision
it's making about what the color looks
like and how good the autofocus system
is so the galaxy s7 is remarkably good
at making judgements about exposure it
also has the best auto focus of any
smart phone I've ever tested it's
remarkably fast its remarkably accurate
and it's very very good in low-light the
iPhone 7 it's very close it's you know
pretty good at making exposure judgments
better than most other phones on the
market on the other hand the images it
produces tend to be a little more muted
but the big thing that the iPhone 7 plus
has gone for it is it has a second lens
so you basically have an optical zoom on
a smartphone camera for the first time
in any real useful way and that's
awesome the pixels a little more
interesting so the pixel has this really
amazing performance when it comes to
sharpness it also performs very well in
low-light like a dim bar but my big
issue with the pixel is it doesn't make
good judgments about white balance with
the white balance wrong you lose a lot
of the really sort of beautiful color
detail that you might want in a photo
you're gonna upload to Instagram and
then also it's autofocus system in my
testing is not good so here's the deal
you're looking for the smartphone that's
gonna take the best picture straight out
of your pocket I have to say that's
still the galaxy SM
